name: Penthorum
Relationship: Compare: PENTHORUM often follows PULSAT. SANG.; HYDR.

Nose: CONSTANT WET FEELING IN NOSE, which no amount of blowing will relieve
Discharge thick, pus-like, streaked with blood

details: A remedy for coryza, with rawness and wet feeling in nose. Throat feels raw. Chronic disorders of mucous membranes, with irritability. Chronic post-nasal catarrh; chronic pharyngitis, mucous membrane purple and relaxed. Posterior nares feel moist and raw; nose and ears feel full. Aphonia, hoarseness, relaxed vocal cords. Hypersecretion of mucous membranes. Itching of anus and burning in rectum. Trouble in pharyngeal vault and Eustachian tube.
dosage: Not very active, and better adapted to chronic affections; its use should be persisted in for some time. Lower potencies.
